channel.title: Trouble getting HD pack to work on original HL
channel.description:
Okay, I just bought Half Life Anthology off of Steam and I'm trying to install the HD pack that came out with Blue Shift.
I did some digging around and found this [url]https://www.jan-ripper.de/articles/steam_hd/[/url] (These instructions were also found on the steam forums, so I know they are legit.)
I get the confirmation message that you can see on the lower right telling me it's been activated, but when I go to play Half Life, no dice. (If I click it again, it tells me it's already active.)
I tried removing it (and getting a successful removal message) and putting it back. But it still isn't working.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.
The Wandering God
